title: Payday lender QuickQuid 'on verge of collapse'
text:
One of the country’s most complained-about payday lenders is on the verge of collapse, marking the latest failure following a regulatory crackdown on the consumer finance sector.

CashEuroNet UK, which trades under the QuickQuid brand, could be placed into administration within a matter of days, Sky News reported.

Grant Thornton is understood to be lined up to lead the insolvency process, although the accounting firm declined to comment on its involvement with CashEuroNet UK.

It has worked on the administration of the UK's biggest short-term lender Wonga, which went bust in August 2018 following a string of customer compensation claims.

In March, Grant Thornton revealed that more than 40,000...
description: One of the country’s most complained-about payday lenders is on the verge of collapse, marking the latest failure following a regulatory crackdown on the consumer finance sector.
